entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:15 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -44.2°C
Wind: NNW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
